articles.author: DAVID BAUDER AP Media Writer
articles.title: For 'Jeopardy' fans, Ken Jennings is the greatest
articles.description: Contestant Ken Jennings is the winner of ‘Jeopardy’s' entertaining tournament to name the mythical 'Greatest of All Time' player in the game show's history
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- 
Being bold paid off for new Jeopardy! mega-champion Ken Jennings, while it didn't for his opponents.
Jennings won his third match in the Jeopardy! Greatest of all Time contest televised on Tuesday, an event that's been a prime-time hit for ABC.… [+1601 chars]
